extendedInfo.description: A free Bible App from The Bible Society in Israel. Now you can read, listen and share God's Word in Hebrew. Carry the Bible App from The Bible Society in Israel wherever you go.The Bible Society in Israel App was created by Subsplash.

reviews.title: Israeli Believer!
reviews.comment: Your Hebrew is way unreadable it\'s a mess of scrambled Hebrew letters without any meaning... shame but enjoy the Hebrew player which is clear language :-/ ??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hebrew appears left to right, fixing gets five stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty awesome
reviews.comment: Looks like the app has been updated. Its awesome that not only can you read the Bible but you can listen to it! Great app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Been waiting for this update. So encouraging to see and hear the Bible translation.  Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did not work
reviews.comment: This app did not work for my phone. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Backwards text but still great
reviews.comment: The Hebrew shows up backwards on my HTC Thunderbolt, even though Hebrew normally shows up right on my phone when texting.  The audio bible is amazingly professional, by far the most professional Hebrew recording of the scriptures I\'ve ever heard. That\'s why I\'m rating this with 5 stars.  Definitely support this in any way you can.  !\327\252\327\225\327\223\327\224
reviews.author: A Google User
